div.p: You can easily return or exchange any unwanted or unsuited items, products, or services up to 40 days after purchasing the same. There are conditions that the item, product, or service must not be used and should remain in their original condition inclusive of all the tags and labels remaining in the correct position. In case of the electronic gadgets like phones
